description:
My place is located in the best neighborhood in Queens,NY.  Only 15 mins away from Manhattan. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the kitchen, the new painting and furniture, the coziness and it's 1 block away from the subway station. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and big groups.

1st Floor Beautiful apt. New forniture and painting. Only one block away from the Subway station R/M
15 mins away from Manhattan. Restaurants, Stores(Victoria Secret, express, starbucks, etc)

Spacious kitchen, living room, free parking on the street

As much as you want me too. I'll be ready to assist you

Many restaurants, movie theatre, stores. This neighborhood is the best in Queens. Nice people, quiet and secure

1 block away from the subway station
name: BEAUTIFUL AND SPACIOUS APARTMENT
review: LiLi was very easy to communicate and very accommodating with our stay. She allowed us to check in early. The place is very close to the subway and the food in the area is sooo good  her home was very clean and spacious also it's located on the first floor which is sooo good for us lazy people. Parking is easy to find surprise a little because the area is pretty populated. All around a great stay! She also left us a cute note and was very helpful!
